text:
e="preserve">Mufti Mohammad Sayeed (12 January 1936 – 7 January 2016) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the People's Democratic Party (PDP). He served as the Chief Minister of Jammu and Kashmir from 2 November 2002 until 2 November 2005 and, again, from 1 March 2015 until his death.
Sayeed was born in Bijbehara, Kashmir and Jammu. He was a Kashmiri Muslim. He was married and had three children.
Sayeed died from multiple organ failure on 7 January 2016 in New Delhi, aged 79.

annotations.surface_form: Chief Minister of Jammu and Kashmir
